scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev-server" "node scripts/prebuild-project.js && parcel view/index.html --out-dir build_project"
scripts.dev-slides: npm run prebuild-slides && npm run serve-slides
scripts.deploy-slides: npm run prebuild-slides && parcel build slides/view/*.html slides/view/*.pug --out-dir build_slides --public-url PUBLICURL --no-cache --no-source-maps && node scripts/fix-links.js
scripts.dev-examples: npm run prebuild-examples && npm run serve-examples
scripts.deploy-examples: npm run prebuild-examples && parcel build examples/view/*.html examples/view/*.pug --out-dir build_examples --public-url PUBLICURL --no-cache --no-source-maps && node scripts/fix-links.js
scripts.deploy-all: npm run deploy-examples && npm run deploy-slides && node scripts/copy_materials.js && cd wiki && npm run build && cd ..
